name: Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka
summary:
Super Vadimka VI: A Terrible Threat there is No Vadimka - It is a side-scrolling platformer developed by VadimBallzGame, which was announced on January 5, 2023. It is the sixth part of a series of games. Super Vadimka at the moment this game is very similar to. Super Mario Bros where you take the cowboys and shoot enemies and bosses at the moment is a 16-bit version also of characters and new antagonists to confront between Dr. Kulik.

A hero by name. Super Vadimka returns to confront the main villain. Dr. Kulik who seeks to take over the world in a global world.
